name: Middlesex Water Company
description: Middlesex Water Company is a leading provider of water and wastewater services in New Jersey and Delaware. Established in 1897, the company has built a solid reputation for delivering high-quality water services while maintaining a strong commitment to environmental sustainability and community service. Middlesex Water operates through several subsidiaries, providing water distribution and wastewater treatment services to residential, commercial, and industrial customers. The company is dedicated to investing in its infrastructure, ensuring the reliability and safety of its water supply. Middlesex Water also emphasizes the importance of conservation, implementing programs aimed at reducing water usage and promoting responsible water management among its customers. With a focus on innovation, the company utilizes advanced technologies to enhance its operations, including smart water metering and leak detection systems. As a regulated utility, Middlesex Water is committed to adhering to stringent environmental regulations and delivering exceptional service to its customers while contributing positively to the communities it serves.
ceo: Kurt E. E. D. E. A. Decker

key_executives.name: Kurt E. E. D. E. A. Decker

faq.question: What services does Middlesex Water Company provide?
faq.answer: Middlesex Water Company provides water distribution and wastewater treatment services.

faq.question: Where is Middlesex Water Company headquartered?
faq.answer: Middlesex Water Company is headquartered in Iselin, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: When was Middlesex Water Company founded?
faq.answer: Middlesex Water Company was founded in 1897.

faq.question: What is Middlesex Water Company's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: Middlesex Water Company is dedicated to environmental sustainability and water conservation.
